title: new mr/hp/movespeed item
body:
i think it would be really good if a new mr item came out for mages/tanks that game movespeed maybe it could build out of {{item:3211}} and {{item:3113}}

it's stat's would be

40-50mr
300hp
30ap

passive: 5%movespeed (increased to 8-12% movespeed when moving towards enemy champs)
this item grants an additional 1 ap for every 5% hp missing max: 20

cost: 2750?

+ cowl passive

maybe some tweaks here and there but i could really use a nice mr item for singed and other movespeed tanks.

I get where you're coming from but it sounds like the movespeed is a core part of the item op wants.
20 mr is pretty much nothing, I would not consider getting banner of command over current MR items.

its 40. you get the aura MR too.

also, banner is the most OP item in the game at the moment....anyone can buy it and it will be useful.
the item is better than locket by a long shot even without the most OP active in the game.

i get it on champs like kha and lee sin even with their pitiful AP ratios. because all the other MR items are trash. some are worse than not buying any items at all. looking at you maw, i get more AD from just going AFK.

cool, but i still would not get it over banshee's veil. also even if I did, nerfs are inevitable

also the point was movespeed

i was replying to the %%%%%%ed "wouldnt get it over other MR items" and "20 mr so bad"

its by far the best MR item in the game unless you specifically want or need something else. visage for healers (lifesteal or regen), BV for 1 shot pony blockers (veigay karthus a few others) where blocking that first skill helps a ton, locket (1 per team, where the shield is actually worth, usually to deal with instant AOE that causes wombos, good vs ori or amumu comps if you can locket in time to shield everyone from the damage when you misplay.)  abyssal for close range mages who need to not get blown up while doing their combo (kat fiddle, thats about it, oh right, %%%%ter swain might get it over visage for some reason) maw is crap, athenes....for MR? %%%% right off. GA for MR? meh ok, but really you want the rebirth....dont lie. what else even gives MR? wits %%%%ter? no thanks. bugger all else...
I don't know man, Phantom Dancer is core on every tank I play.
The only part of that item you want that doesnt make sense is the AP. if you want an MR item that grants movespeed I can see it. But the AP restricts it to being built on like... 4 champions.
exactly, but it gives good stats so it would prevent most ad carries from building it just for movespeed, also who wouldn't get this on galio or fiddle? or singed/malph
